33
EXCLUSION OF HOUSEHOLD ITEMS
(1) The surviving spouse and the decedent's descendants as well as adoptive children and their descendants who have lived in the same household with the decedent shall inherit household items intended for the fulfilment of their daily needs, such as furniture, household appliances and other household equipment, bedding and similar, but not when these objects are of high value.
(2) The items thus excluded shall not be included in the calculation of the statutory portion and the hereditary portion of the heir in question.
